Texts.Chs: 一只星之子最爱的云鼠挤在这件小房子里.它不会挥发掉吧.
Texts.Eng: A pet house! A lil on the cramped side but who's complainin'?

Texts.Chs: 房子里住着叶族人最爱的蛇.不过蛇不是应该住在草窝里的么。
Texts.Eng: Floran sssnake usually live in tall grasss. Pet housse unnatural.

Texts.Chs: 对于一只猿族人最喜爱的鼬鼠来说这是个好房子.
Texts.Eng: Home sweet home to a beloved pet.

Texts.Chs: 里面住着一只猫！人类的朋友和‘主人’.
Texts.Eng: Just another thoughtful gift for my ungrateful feline companion to ignore.

Texts.Chs:
对于一只小动物来说大小正正好好可以住的很舒服.但你得给你的宠物重新再找个家，里面已经住着一只小动物了.
^#B8860B;可在飞船用家具定制台调整种族风格^reset;
Texts.Eng: Just big enough for a small animal to fit comfortably inside. Comes with a free pet.

Texts.Chs: 给兔子住的某种小房子，为什么长满羽毛的翼族人会喜欢哺乳动物。
Texts.Eng: Some kind of small house for a creature. I bet my bunny would love it!

Texts.Chs: 屋子里住着一只蛟族人的宠物蟹莓，生于大海，长于星空。
Texts.Eng: This isn't a conventional house for a crasberry, but it will do.

Texts.Chs: 电子人为什么要把小猪养在狗舍里？
Texts.Eng: This kennel would suit my prized piglet.
